t: The*pn Lord*s reigns, let the earth be glad; let*ld the distant shores rejoice.
Clouds*ln and thick darkness surround him; righteousness*ld and justice are the foundation of his throne.
Fire*ln goes before him and*ld consumes his foes on every side.

All*pn who worship images are put to shame, those*ld who boast in idolsâ€” worship*ld him, all you gods!
Zion*pn hears and rejoices and*ld the villages of Judah are glad because*ld of your judgments, Lord.*s
For*ln you, Lord,*s are the Most High over all the earth; you*ld are exalted far above all gods.
Let*ln those who love the Lord*s hate evil, for*ld he guards the lives of his faithful ones and*ld delivers them from the hand of the wicked.
